attributes.action: Do not allow a 4th vote of the same deal proposed by Mrs May re leaving the EU.
attributes.additional_details: It has been voted on and rejected 3 times already by MPs and her bribes and promises make no alteration to the deal itself which is, in her own words, worse than no deal. Mrs May tried to have her resignation dangle like a carrot for MPs to vote for it, they didn't and she should resign for trying to bribe MPs with promises of extra funds and her going, that isn't how Parliament should behave.
attributes.background: Parliament have voted 3 times on Theresa May's terrible deal. There is no change to be had from the EU on this proposal and it has been rejected. There is no good reason for a 4th vote.
